A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
THINGS I DISLIKE

In the opening scene\, a Resistance pilot prank calls the First Order\, an idiotic strategy that miraculously works. 

Hux\, the menacing fascist general from The Force Awakens\, is suddenly a comic relief character. 

Leia flies through the vacuum of space like Mary Poppins and is in a coma until she wakes up when it is convenient for the plot.

The legendary hero Luke Skywalker is a hermit who milks grotesque alien sea cow udders.

Rey is the ultimate Mary Sue. She is devoid of flaws and feels more like a god than a human. 

Poe Dameron is unlikeable. He disobeys Leia and needlessly causes innumerable resistance fighters to die but is merely demoted. When he mutinies\, Leia and Holdo speak fondly of him\, instead of dishonorably discharging him. 

Vice Admiral Holdo's purple hair and prom dress are distracting.

In a scene stolen out of Spaceballs\, Finn and Rose are arrested for illegal parking at a casino where they are on a quest to find a master hacker. A different hacker breaks them out of jail. Finn and Rose free abused animals and ride them on a stampede into a casino. This casino subplot contributes nothing to the story.

At the climax\, Rose crashes into Finn to prevent him from sacrificing himself to destroy the First Order super-cannon in a kamikaze attack. 

When Rose crashes into Finn to stop him from sacrificing himself to destroy the First Order super-cannon\, she says the nonsensical line\, "This is how we win: Not by fighting what we hate but by saving what we love." Never mind that Finn was trying to sacrifice himself to save his loved ones. 

THINGS I LIKE

In Star Wars\, the audience meets Luke when he sees a projection of Leia asking for help and watches the twin suns set. In The Last Jedi\, Luke sends an astral projection of himself to help Leia and fades into the Force as he watches the twin suns set.

The multiple conflicting flashbacks of Ben Solo's fall to the dark side were a nice homage to Akira Kurosawa's Rashomon.

The cinematography and visual effects are fantastic.

Some of the jokes are funny.
